name: Asher
reviews: The has great processing power, nice screen, speedy graphics and can be a desktop replacement as well as occasional tablet. The pen works well and charges quickly....

name: Matty
reviews: This is a stunning laptop, but unfortunately came with issue right out of the box. It booted out of the box to a blue error screen, and has consistently had issues despite updating all required drivers and a new install of Windows 10. Itâ€™ll have to be sent in for repair...

name: Haywood
reviews: This was my first pc with windows 11 and I really like it. My previous hp had the power button on the side. I like this location to the right of the numbers better.

name: Anitra
reviews: This product has been performing well since I got it. It can even perform very light gaming. As with my last Spectre, I am immensely satisfied with the polish and feel of the laptop. However, be aware of the potential dangers of burn-in if you opt for the OLED model.

name: Desiri
reviews: The laptop is much better than any video, the 3:2 ratio is a huge plus for productivity.

name: Riley
reviews: The laptop is much better than any video, the 3:2 ratio is a huge plus for productivity.
